LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_StasisPill.label: stasis chemicals
LanguageData.ABF_Hediff_Synstruct_StasisPill.descript: A slurry of highly conductive, mildly sedative synthetic chemicals are in the host, greatly reducing power consumption at the cost of reduced work efficiency.\n\nDesigned for long-distance travel without access to reliable power where consumption efficiency triumphs over work efficiency.
